biotools.summary: Relative codon adaptation is a novel index for measuring codon adaptation in genomic sequences. Similar to CAI, it can use a reference geneset to estimate gene expression, but it takes directly into account the background nucleotide distribution.

bioschemas.name: RCA
bioschemas.summary: Relative codon adaptation is a novel index for measuring codon adaptation in genomic sequences. Similar to CAI, it can use a reference geneset to estimate gene expression, but it takes directly into account the background nucleotide distribution.
